Activate 1 Interact

Made from a special mixture of honey and alchemical reagents, poison fizz is a zesty, sweet rock candy that pops and crackles in your mouth. For 1 hour, you have a +3 item bonus to saving throws against poison and being petrified.

Secondary Effect 2 (poison)

Effect You bite the poison fizz to release its poisonous liquid center and spray green mist in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15]. This deals @Damage[5d6[poison]] with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:34|basic:true|traits:poison]. A creature that critically fails is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Blinded] until the end of your next turn and is then temporarily immune to being blinded by poison fizz for 1 hour.
